features: WATERLESS SHAVING CREAM SHAVE GEL: Shave anywhere without water using this gentle dry shaving cream
DRY SHAVING GEL FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Speed Shave Waterless Shaving Cream prevents razor burn & bumps
SHAVING GEL FOR ANY BLADE RAZOR: Perfect shaving cream for straight razors or safety razor blades
BEST TRAVEL SHAVING CREAM: Shaving cream for travel, camping, vacation
body.description: BodyVerde is proud to offer you Speed Shave, our exclusive Waterless Shaving Cream. Perfect for anyone on the go our Dry Shaving Gel Consists of a natural, delicately blended, ready to use formula. With Speed Shave there is no need for showering, bathing, or even rinsing. Our blend of rich emollients, chamomile, olive oil, and aloe naturally moisturize your skin while creating a smooth lathered surface which helps to preventing razor burn, bumps, cuts, and nicks. After shaving Our Dry Shaving Cream quickly absorbs into your skin leaving your face, legs and arms silky smooth and soft. Speed Shaves light citrus scent is all natural and free of artificial dyes and fragrance. Speed Shave gives you the freedom to shave on the go virtually anywhere. Our Waterless shaving cream is the perfect companion for travelers, campers, hikers, outdoorsmen, and even business travelers. Now you can experience a quick comfortable shave that leaves your skin feeling silky smooth and fresh even without water. Perfect for quickly eliminating a 5 O'clock shadow on the go, or for touching up your legs and arms when travel has kept you from the shower.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Miracle Blends of Nature BodyVerde products are made with the belief that pure ingredients from nature have the power to accelerate your body’s own amazing ability to heal itself, in a way that is compatible with our own skin. These 100% plant-based blends feature extracts, essential oils and antioxidants from flower, plant and sea elements enhanced with emollient-rich olive and sunflower oils and shea butter.

Our shaving cream is made with our own SmartGlide Technology. SmartGlide delivers a synergistic blend of ingredients that coat each hair and minimize friction and bumps for a super moisturizing shave. Skin stays soft all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes shaving so much easier
reviews.reviewText: Squirt some on your legs, rub it all over, and start to shave. I used a full bottle and ordered more. I love it l.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I am a little obsessed with having zero stubble. This stuff works great. I use it while sitting at my desk on conference calls. I live in a very dry climate and don't shower every day so my hair won't dry out. This is an amazing solution. I have extremely coarse hair and this works great in spite of that. My skin feels soft after I use it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well but clogs multiblade razors
reviews.reviewText: I've used BodyVerde Waterless Shave and its competitor Bold; both work fine. This is a cream, Bold is a bluish gel. This comes in a handy pump dispenser, Bold comes in a much less convenient tube that sits on its wide top. If you use this or Bold with a multiblade razor, both will gum up the razor unless you have hot water to rinse it. If you use this stuff and don't rinse it off your face, it'll burn a little after awhile, Bold is a bit more comfortable after shaving. Last but not least, you get 8 ounces of this for about what you pay for 4 ounces of Bold.In a perfect world, Bold would cost the same and come in the same pump dispenser... but since it doesn't, I'll probably buy the BodyVerde again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saves on Water
reviews.reviewText: Since my son moved back home and takes long showers, when I take mine I have to be quick so there is plenty of hot water. So I decided to shave outside of the shower. With this dry shave gel, I only need to initially wet my skin with my wet hand from the sink. Then smooth this on (feels like lotion) and shave. Only downside is the razor will clog so I wipe it off occasionally with a dry paper towel. It's quick and painless. And lotion use afterwards is not even necessary because your skin will feel soft from the cream. A truly unique product and I even use it under arms. Lasts awhile too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shaving hack!
reviews.reviewText: Great for in my case of psoriatic arthritis when I don't feel up to shaving while showering or running behind. You can shave anywhere and it leaves your legs silky smooth without water. This is a staple all shaving people should have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The Nivea works better and clogs the razor less and cost less
reviews.reviewText: I use Nivea (Smooth sensation) lotion to shave and decided to give this a try. The Nivea works better and clogs the razor less and cost less. I am still in search of the perfect norinse shave item however. Using lotion to shave with only works well the the mach4 and shaving everyday. If I skip a days shave then it will be painful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Piece of crap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ... and that only worked well when I used a good amount of this product and if I was quick ...
reviews.reviewText: I tried it without water and that only worked well when I used a good amount of this product and if I was quick enough to shave before it started to dry. I don't do that anymore because it didn't work as well as in the shower where it stayed moist. Now I just use it when showering, but it's good to know that I have the option of using it without water as well. Also, though it's expensive for what it is, I like it better than other shave creams and I've pretty much tried them all.
It works well as it recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 11, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: Great results and bottle lasts long time
reviews.reviewText: Normally when shaving my legs they start to feel prickly the day after, but they still feel so smooth the following day! Definitely takes the hassle out of shaving. My husband uses it too and says it is very convenient as no additional moisturiser needed afterwards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 2, 2016
reviews.reviewText: This shaving lotion is lovely, the razor glides over and reduces cutting risk and rashes. You need a tiny amount so will last a long time. Think I will make this a regular item in my cabinet! Highly reccomend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 24, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Very good alternative to shaving gel and eco friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 11, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Do not waste your money! I couldn't wait to try this and was sorely disappointed. Not only did it clog up 2 razors before i had even finished shaving my legs it also caused serious bleeding! Would definitely not recommend.
